attributes.action: Publication of the results of TV telephone voting
attributes.additional_details:
There are a range of broadcast media encouraging the public to vote, at a cost, for reality TV/Talent shows.     Also there are TV competitions.

There should be a requirement that within 24 hours of a result being declared the results MUST be made readily available to the public by being provided to OFCOM and published on their website.

1) The number of votes cast for each option
2) The total amount of money charged
3) The total amount to be passed to charity(ies) - If applicable)
